name: willo-wiki
description: Tree structure based note taking app

scripts.setup:dev: npm --prefix ./ui/ run setup:dev && npm --prefix ./firebase/ run setup:dev
scripts.setup:ci: npm --prefix ./ui/ run setup:ci && npm --prefix ./firebase/ run setup:ci
scripts.build:ci: npm --prefix ./ui/ run build:ci && npm --prefix ./firebase/ run build:ci

author: Scott Benton
